column5: We decided on a fly in trip in mid June using Air-dale service to either Fred Lake or Tony Lake near Wawa. Anyone have any experience on these lakes..or any other lakes in this area. Thanks. Pat

I've never used Air Dale, but have heard good things about Tony and Medhurst lakes. I've used Hawk Air, located directly across the lake from Air Dale many times over the years, with pretty much every trip being a success. If you want any specific info on their lakes shoot me a pm.  cheers , Mike
